Interfaces
Class ImageView

java.lang.Object
  Interfaces.ImageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class ImageView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer

ImageView is a graphic view of the Zuul game. It shows images on the screen.

Version:
1.0 (May 2009)
Author:
Charlet Pierre, Kniebihler Nicolas, Provost Kevin
